briefOverviewPreparationReport: Brief overview of the process of preparation of the report
statusUpdatedNationalBiodiversity: Status of the updated or revised national biodiversity strategies and action plans (NBSAPs) in the light of the post-2020 global biodiversity framework
assessmentOfProgress2050Goals: Assessment of progress towards the 2050 goals
assessmentOfProgressNationalTargets: Assessment of progress towards national targets and contributions to progress in the 2030 action targets
conclusionsImplementationConvention: Conclusions on the implementation of the Convention and the post-2020 global biodiversity framework
informationAsRequested: Information as requested in related decisions adopted by the Conference of the Parties at its fifteenth meeting
